entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Changing MainPage of a Maui app breaks OnBackPressedDispatcher callback #19203
  • Border Stoke data binding does not work #19201
  • Splash screen no longer working in .Net 8 Maui #19200
  • AdaptiveTrigger does not work #19197
  • VerticalScrollBar not visible until hovered #19196
  • .NET 8 first item in CollectionView larger than rest #19195
  • When making minor changes to a xaml file, after saving and running on Windows Machine a unhandled exception happens. When changing back (ctrl-z) it doesn't fix it. #19193
  • Allow to set a custom MauiWinUIWindow #19192
  • Picker TitleColor not working on iOS #19191
  • Setting a style on a label causes spans with FontAttributes to be ignored on Android #19190
  • Images in html from assets displaying in WebView are not displayed on Android and iOS #19189
    Backlog
  • WebView Scale out of screen #19188
  • ListView GroupHeaderTemplate produces blank headers on iOS #19186
    Backlog
  • [build] Remove GitInfo #19185
    Backlog
  • Use System.Net.WebUtility.HtmlDecode instead of System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode #19183

Closed

  • Unable to run MAUI app on physical iOS device #19202
  • ERROR WHILE COMPLETING THE .NET MUAI #19034
  • Bitmap accumulates until OutOfMemory exception #18894
  • GraphcView: Draw method of Drawable constantly fires #19009
  • WebView in android forget user login credentials every app restart #19010
  • Pinch And Pan Gesture not Working Properly #19028
  • Unreliable Connection to Mac from Windows #19153
  • VersionTracking only return 1.0.0.1 on Windows platform #19179
  • Can't compile on Mac #19039
  • Random crashes on iOS when navigating #18153
    Backlog
  • SQLite db crash the app in .net8 #19173

PullRequests

Created

  • Translucent and Transparent NavigationBar on iOS #19204
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, .NET 8 SR2
  • NativeAOT: Add integration tests for testing MAUI compatibility with NativeAOT on iOS #19194
    community ✨
  • [testing] Increase timeout for device tests #19184
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Testing] Add SetSliderValue method to UITest #19182
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-slider, legacy-ui-test
  • [Testing] Add scroll methods to UITest #19181
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test

Merged

  • Update ShellSectionRenderer.cs #18945
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Migrate to the Locker GitHub action for locking closed/stale issues/PRs #19145
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19169
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Testing] Add PressVolumeUp and PressVolumeDown methods to UITest #19131
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix Flyout Header breaking clicking over items #19125
  • [Windows] Fix setting flyout width (#19068) #19070
    platform/windows 🪟, area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • [Testing] Added lifecycle methods to UITest #19102
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18747
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • - [Android] Fix ShouldShowToolbarButton for FlyoutPage #18522
    area/FlyoutPage, community ✨
  • Allow GesturePlatformManager to be created for views with null window… #18938
    community ✨, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-webview, s/pr-needs-author-input, Under Consideration
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D24 #18713
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Fix for button cornerradius 0 on android #18959
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Correct nullable annotations on IMediaPicker #19157
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞
  • Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, layout-scrollview, legacy-ui-test
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
